author: Vanmala Subramaniam
title: Here’s how plenty of small businesses are being left behind by emergency government benefits
description: 'We are doing our part for the greater good, but cannot roll over like martyrs'
content:
If revenue at Julie Skirvings eight-year-old clothing business continues dropping at its current rate for the rest of the spring and into the usually lucrative summer season, she said it might not make it to the fall. 
I would have lost hundreds of thousands… [+4947 chars]
